name: Hyper-V Recovery Software
overview:
Grab Hyper-V file recovery software and simply repair corrupt Virtual disk error and corruptions in a couple of minutes. It enable to recover deleted files from VHD partition without any extra efforts.

If you are in worry & need a solution to repair corrupt Virtual disk errors & other corruptions issues, then just follow us and apply VHD recovery software on this situation. This software especially devised with some advance and easy to use GUI techniques which not only handle corruption or damage issues but also get back data from it without requiring any extra skill.

Key Features • Repair Corruptions, damaged, inaccessible VHD file • Recover deleted files from VHD partition • Recover data including: video, images, audios, media files, database etc without alteration • Free demo version is also available

Free demo version of Hyper-V recovery software works just as full version software, but the only thing it restricts and that is saving option. Demo version repair and recover entire data of VHD file but unable to save them. Users just see the working steps of this software via evaluation copy.

To Know more information about this product, feel free to visit us: http://www.vhddatarecovery.net/
